title: Textile, ca. 1785
medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation
dimensions:
H x W: 41.9 x 61 cm (16 1/2 x 24 in.)
Repeat H: 30.5 cm (12 in.)
description: Fragment of printed cotton with an all-over design of intertwining branches with large, exotic flowers and pairs of birds; background is filled with fine red vine. In blue, green, yellow, and several shades of purple, red and pink on an off-white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1785.
ca. 1785. Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-85.
